message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the line item "Cost of Goods Sold" which typically represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

From the income statement:
- The "Cost of Goods Sold" is listed as 11,600,000.00

This represents the value of inventory that was sold during the reporting period from 2023-12-31 to 2024-02-05.

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 11,600,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '11600000.00'} }
```
